content: प्रति {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} As a prefix to verbs it means ({%a%}) towards, in the direction of; ({%b%}) back, in return, again; ({%c%}) in opposition to, against, counter; ({%d%}) upon, down upon; (see the several roots with this preposition). {@--2@} As a prefix to nouns not directly derived from verbs it means ({%a%}) likeness, resemblance, equality; ({%b%}) opposite, of the opposite side; प्रतिबल <ls>Ve. 3. 5</ls> ‘the opposing force’; so प्रतिद्विपाः <ls>Mu. 2. 13</ls>; ({%c%}) rivalry; as in प्रतिचंद्रः ‘a rival moon’; प्रतिपुरुषः &c. {@--3@} As a separable preposition (with <ab>acc.</ab>) it means ({%a%}) towards, in the direction of, to; तौ दंपती स्वां प्रति राजधानीं प्रस्थापयामास वशी वसिष्ठः <ls>R. 2. 70</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 75</ls>; प्रत्यनिलं विचेरुः <ls>Ku. 3. 31</ls>; वृक्षं प्रति विद्योतते विद्युत् <ls>Sk.</ls>; ({%b%}) against, counter, in opposition to, opposite; तदा यायाद्रिपुं प्रति <ls>Ms. 7. 171</ls>; प्रदुद्रुवुस्तं प्रति राक्षसेंद्रं <ls>Rām.</ls>; ययावजः प्रत्यरिसैन्यमेव <ls>R. 7. 55</ls>; ({%c%}) in comparison with, on a par with, in proportion to, a match for; त्वं सहस्राणि प्रति <ls>Rv. 2. 1. 8</ls>; ({%d%}) near, in the vicinity of, by, at, in, on; समासेदुस्ततो गंगां शृंगवेरपुरं प्रति <ls>Rām.</ls>; गंगां प्रति; ({%e%}) at the time, about, during; आदित्यस्योदयं प्रति <ls>Mb.</ls>; फाल्गुनं वाथ चैत्रं वा मासौ प्रति <ls>Ms. 7. 182</ls>; ({%f%}) on the side of, in favour of, to the lot of; यदत्र मां प्रति स्यात् <ls>Sk.</ls>; हरं प्रति हलाहलं (अभवत्) <ls>Vop.</ls>; ({%g%}) in each, in or at every, severally (used in a distributive sense); वर्षं प्रति, प्रतिवर्षं; यज्ञं प्रति <ls>Y. 1. 110</ls>; वृक्षं वृक्षं प्रति सिंचति <ls>Sk.</ls>; ({%h%}) with regard or reference to, in relation to, regarding, concerning, about, as to; न हि मे संशीतिरस्या दिव्यतां प्रति <ls>K. 132</ls>; चंद्रोपरागं प्रति तु केनापि विप्रलब्धासि <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; धर्मं प्रति <ls>Ś. 5. 18</ls>; मंदौत्सुक्योस्मि नगरगमनं प्रति <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 27</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 83</ls>; त्वयैकमीशं प्रति साधु भाषितं <ls n="Ku.">5. 81</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 218</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 12</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 29</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 51</ls>; ({%i%}) according to, in conformity with; मां प्रति in my opinion; ({%j%}) before, in the presence of; ({%k%}) for, on account of. {@--4@} As a separable preposition (with <ab>abl.</ab>) it means either ({%a%}) a representative of, in place of, instead of; प्रद्युम्नः कृष्णात्प्रति <ls>Sk.</ls>, सं ग्रामे यो दारायणतः प्रति <ls>Bk. 8. 89</ls>; or ({%b%}) in exchange or return for; तिलेभ्यः प्रति यच्छति माषान् <ls>Sk.</ls>; भक्तेः प्रत्यमृतं शंभोः <ls>Vop.</ls> {@--5@} As the first member of Avyayībhāva compounds it usually means ({%a%}) in or at every; as प्रतिसंवत्सरं ‘every year’; प्रतिक्षणं, प्रत्यहं &c.; ({%b%}) towards, in the direction of; प्रत्यग्नि शलभा डयंते. {@--6@} प्रति is sometimes used as the last member of <ab>Avyayī.</ab> <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘a little’; सूपप्रति, शाकप्रति. ({%Note%}. In the compounds given below all words the second members of which are words not immediately connected with verbs, are included; other words will be found in their proper places)
